name: casaIQ
0:
”Alexa, turn on the bedroom light”
”Alexa, brighten the bedroom light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Use Alexa to control your casaIQ devices with your voice! 

Onboard Alexa with a few simple steps. Skip the first four steps if you already have Echo: 
(1) Download our casaIQ app.
(2) Make an account and add some devices.
(3) Download the Amazon Alexa app and complete the setup. 
(4) Go to Devices, then scroll down to click on "Your Smart Home Skills".
(5) Search for and enable the casaIQ skill. You will be taken to a login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking. 
(6) Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices", wait for Echo to say “Search complete”. Now all setup is finished, enjoy voice control! 
Here are some sample commands:
“Alexa, turn on the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, turn off the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, set the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, brighten the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, dim the bedroom light to 50%.”
"Alexa, set bedroom light to green."
